meanings.definition: A male given name of Hebrew origin, also a surname.
meanings.english_definition: A male given name of Hebrew origin, also a surname.

examples.sentence: Benyamin Netanyahu is a former Prime Minister of Israel.
examples.translation: ベンヤミン・ネタニヤフは、イスラエルの元首相です。

etymology.value: From Hebrew בִּנְיָמִין (Binyāmīn), meaning "son of the right hand" or "son of the south".
